name: 4chan and 888chan+
description: This style is forked from style 5200, so along with removing ads and making 4chan look nicer, I've added support for 888chan, 000chan, 4chanarchive, and made the post area nearly invisible until mouseover, which makes it easier to read long posts.
additional_info:
Update July 23, 2010: Cleaned up some new ads.

Update Nov. 27, 2009: Removed ad from 4chan post area and added a small bit of visibility to the post area.

Update Sept 28, 2009: Added 000chan.

Update Sept 17, 2009: Removed some more ads and added 4chanarchive.org.

Update Sept 16, 2009: Updated ad removal code.
